Introduction

XG (an acronym for Xtraordinary Girls) is a Japanese global girl group under XGALX. They made their debut on March 18, 2022 with their first single “Tippy Toes.”

The group had been training for 5 years, starting in 2017 until the end of 2021. They have a hip-hop/R&B concept, and their the first girl group to debut under a global production label XGALX, which is a subsidary label of Avex. The group attempts to empower people worldwide with their fresh music and performances.

On July 25, the group announced that their offical fandom name will be ALPHAZ.
